text:
RELIGION

Sri Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple: Teppa thiruvizha, 10.05, holy flag hoisting, deity procession, 7 p.m.

Ramakrishna Math: Aarathi, Reserve Line, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Gita Bhavanam: 68{+t}{+h}anniversary, 45-day yagna, Kamarajar Salai, 7.30 a.m.

Saiva Sithandha Sabai: Discourse on ‘Thiruvasagam’ by Prof. Yazh S. Chandra, South Adi Street, Meenakshi Amman Temple, 7 p.m.

Paneeru Thirumurai Mandram: Thiruvasagam Mutrodal by M. Balasubramanian, 7 a.m., Thirupugazh Isai, Adi Street 6 p.m.

Thiruvalluvar Mandram: Discourse on ‘Sekkilar Pillai Tamil’ by T. Arunachalam, S.S. Colony, 5 p.m.

Bhajanashramam: Dhanurmadha puja, Nehru Nagar, 5.30 a.m.

Young Men’s Brahmins’ Association: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayanam and puja, No. 21 Sambandamoorthy Street, 6 p.m.

Sreemath Bhagavath Geetha Siravana Samajam: 85{+t}{+h}year Sreemath Gita Siravana, Gita upanyasam, Govinda Dasa Seva Samajam, Mahal 6{+t}{+h}Street, 6 p.m.

Tirupavai Tiruvembavai Isaipalli: Devotional songs 6 a.m., Paavai songs and devotional songs, Adi Street 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Sri Sathguru Sangeetha Samajam: 64{+t}{+h}music and arts festival, vocal by Sandeep Narayan, Lakshmi Sundaram Hall, 6 p.m.

Gandhi Memorial Museum: K.P. Gangadharan, yoga coordinator conducts, yoga classes, 6 a.m., 10.30 a.m. and 5 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahma Kumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes, 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Yoga Research Centre: Yoga training by S. Yoganand, Department of Philosophy, Madura College, 6.30 a.m.

GENERAL

KLN Polytechnic College: Blood donation camp in association with Lions Club of Madurai City and Meenakshi Mission Hospital, Ln T. Thanikodi, deputy governor, inaugurates, Viraganoor, 9.30 a.m.

Vaigai College of Engineering: Pongal festival celebration, R. Saravana Kumar, president, Therkutheru village panchayat, chief guest, college campus, 2.30 p.m.

TVS Community College: Pongal celebrations, No. 8 Goods Shed Street, 12 noon.

Sermathai Vasan College for Women: Pongal vizha, college campus, 10 a.m.

Thiagarajar College: Awareness programme on eye donation in association with Aravind Eye Hospitals, D. Saravan, Manager, Eye Bank, Aravind Eye Hospital, speaks, Diamond Jubilee Hall, 12.30 p.m.

Sri Aurobindo Mira Matric Higher Secondary School: Pongal celebration, school premises, 9 a.m.

American College: Pongal competitions; M. Davamani Christober, Principal, distributes prizes, 12 noon.

Meenakshi Mission Hospital: Pongal celebrations, N. Sethuraman, founder, presides, 3.30 p.m.; ‘patti mandram,’ G. Gnanasambandan presides, Melur Road, 4.35 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, Dheep Hospital, K. Pudur, 7 p.m.

MELUR

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, A.G. Church, near State Bank, 6.30 p.m.
title: madurai today
